definition: Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
Inner Mongolia/abbr. for 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区[Nei4 meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1], Inner Mongolia autonomous region
Inner Mongolia autonomous region, abbr. 內蒙古|内蒙古[Nei4 meng3 gu3], capital Hohhot 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4]
pinyin: Nei4 meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1

definition: to instruct the young/to initiate/to awake sb from ignorance/to free sb from prejudice or superstition/primer/enlightened/the Enlightenment/Western learning from the late Qing dynasty
Inner Mongolia or Inner Mongolia autonomous region 內蒙古自治區|内蒙古自治区[Nei4 meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]
Mongol ethnic group of north China and Inner Mongolia
Bernard Montgomery (Montie) (1887-1976), Second World War British field marshal/Montgomery or Montgomerie (surname)
Dortmund, city in the Ruhr 魯爾區|鲁尔区[Lu3 er3 Qu1], Germany

sentences.english: Mengsk approached the smaller man and stood before him, an intimidating presence.
sentences.chinese: 蒙克斯以威迫的姿態靠近並站在這位小矮人前面。

sentences.english: Mengsk’s eyes traveled to the newcomer.
sentences.chinese: 蒙克斯的眼神移向新來者。

sentences.english: This grating was nothing else than a piece of the brass screens with which aviaries are covered in menageries .
sentences.chinese: 這個紗罩只不過是塊動物園裏供蒙鳥籠用的銅紗。

sentences.english: Montanus called for less church hierarchy and more charismatic prophecy.
sentences.chinese: 蒙塔努斯呼籲教會少層次和更魅力的預言。

sentences.english: Charmed to see you, Mr. Redond.
sentences.chinese: 雷德蒙先生，見到您很榮幸。

sentences.english: If the king was still alive, he could unite the Mon Calamari and the Quarren.
sentences.chinese: 如果先王還在位，他會聯合蒙卡拉馬里人和誇倫人。

sentences.english: Results The pharmacognostic character of Herba Agriophyllum was described comprehensively.
sentences.chinese: 結果詳細描述了蒙藥材沙蓬的生藥學特徵。

sentences.english: Tour Montparnasse, with 209 meters the second highest in Europe, Paris.
sentences.chinese: 蒙巴納斯大廈，高度209米位於歐洲第二。

sentences.english: its cover photo is one of a pair of eyes staring through a rectangle cut in black fabric.
sentences.chinese: 封面圖片是蒙在長方形黑色紗巾的一雙眼睛。

sentences.english: Wish you a Marry Christmas and Happy New Year.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝，也祝妳聖誔節快樂，新年蒙褔。

sentences.english: God is faithful and you will see the answer to your prayers.
sentences.chinese: 你終必看見禱告得蒙應允。

sentences.english: The prince's presence stirs hope among the captive Mon Calamari.
sentences.chinese: 王子的現身在蒙卡拉馬裏俘虜中激起了希望。

sentences.english: I think the time has come for Montoni's to go smoke-free.
sentences.chinese: 我想該是蒙託尼成爲無煙餐館的時候了。

sentences.english: A veil of green plastic netting has covered Sun's restaurant for months.
sentences.chinese: 幾個月來，孫若男的餐館蒙上綠色的塑料網。

sentences.english: All Yamong villagers assisted vigorously to repair the roads.
sentences.chinese: 也蒙地區各村村民積極協助修補公路。

sentences.english: He made them also to be pitied of all those that carried them captives.
sentences.chinese: 他也使他們在凡擄掠他們的人面前蒙憐恤。

definition: barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
surname Di/generic name for northern ethnic minorities during the Qin and Han Dynasties (221 BC-220 AD)
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
crotch/15th of the 28th constellations of Chinese astronomy
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
